english_translation: I saw upon Ibrahim a thick garment and two cloths, which had been dyed with something of saffron

english_translation: I said to Abdullah ibn Aun: "Have you seen upon Ibrahim saffron-dyed clothing?" He said: "Yes, if Allah wills, it has no eyes (outline) nor polish." (In another chain:) I saw upon Ibrahim a shawl which he wore over his shoulder, and upon him was a cloak that he wore proudly, and he was praying as an imam
